Translations.Text: His companion said: “Our Nourisher-Sustainer! I did not make him a rebel, but he himself slipped into remote ignorance.”
(Allah) said: “Dispute not in My Presence. And without doubt We sent you the warning beforehand
The Statement (issued from Us) is not changed and I am not unjust to (My) Abeed (human subjects).”
The day We say to Hell: “Are you filled up to capacity?” And she will say: “Are there any more (to enter)?”
And the Garden is brought near for Al-Muttaqun. (It is) no more a remote (place for them)
This is what you are promised, meant for all those who are oft-returning (to Allah and are) full protectors (of His ordainments)
whoever remained sincere with Ar-Rahman unseen, and arrived with a heart that turns (to Allah, in repentance and obedience)
Enter you therein with (sense of) peace and security. This is the Day of everlasting (stay)
For them is available whatever they desire therein; and with Us additional (comforts and graceful enjoyments await them)

And how many out of the generations We destroyed before them — they happened to be stronger than them power-wise. At this stage they ran hither and thither in the cities, (and they were constantly crying): “Is there any place of escape or refuge?”
Verily, herein is indeed an admonition for one — for him is a heart (that retains counselling and warning), or he made attentive his hearing and he (stood as a) witness
And surely, indeed We created the heavens and the earth and whatever (exists) between those two in six aeons; and did not overcome Me any of the fatigue

So remain steadfast against (all) that they say and glorify (Allah) with the praise of your Nourisher-Sustainer before the rising of the sun and before (its) setting. [This refers to the Fajr and Asr Prayers]

And (out of the hours of) the night also glorify Him. [This refers to Isha Prayer]. And (do glorify Him) after the declines (of the sun). [The decline after the Zenith refers to Zuhr Prayer. The final decline is ‘becoming set’ after remaining visible throughout the day . This refers to Maghrib Prayers]
And listen! The Day the caller will call (as if) from a nearby place
the Day they will hear As-Saiha in its true sense. This will be (the) Day for coming out (of the burial places)
Verily We, We, We give life, and We cause death; and to Us is the Final Return
The Day the earth cracks up exposing them off instantly. This (will be the Day of the Final) Assembly, quite easy for Us (to bring into being)
We know more about what they will say. And you are not unto them as a tyrant (to pressurise them for developing Faith). So propagate the Message through Al-Quran to that who is afraid of My Warning
Those that scatter to full scattering act as a witness
then those that bear heavy burden
then those that float with ease and gentleness
then those that distribute (the) matter
Definitely what you are promised is surely true
And indeed the Judgement is sure to happen
The heaven full of paths and tracks is a (sure) witness
certainly, you are surely discordant in (your) utterance
Is turned against it (i.e., against the Book of Allah) that one who is turned aside because of falsehood and forgery
Have been annihilated those who indulge in mythology and falsehood—
those who being in stupor are heedless (of the Scripture)
They ask: “When will be the Day of Judgment?”
The Day they are put to torture over the Fire
“Taste you your torture! This is what you desired to be hastened.”
Surely, Al-Muttaqun (will be) in the Gardens and springs
as those who receive and enjoy what their Nourisher-Sustainer has bestowed unto them. Verily, they used to be Muhsinun
They are — a small period out of the night which they pass in rest and sleep
And in the hours just before dawn, they ask (Allah) for forgiveness
And in their possessions remains a specified share for that who asks (for assistance) and (is) unpossessed (of the basic needs)
And within the earth are signs for those who are seehead of state certainty in Faith
and (even) in your ownselves. Will you not then see
And in the heaven is (the source of) your provision, and that which you are promised
Then by (the) Nourisher-Sustainer of the heaven and the earth! Definitely it (the Day of Judgement) is sure truth similar to what as you speak
Has the Hadees of the guests of Ibrahim reached you— honoured individuals (out of the angels)
When they entered in his presence and said: “Salam [peace (and blessing be upon you)].” (Ibrahim) said: “Salam.” (He thought in his mind): ‘a nation of nonfamiliar people!’
Then he turned to his household, and returned with (a portion of) a healthy, fatty (roasted) calf
Then he brought it close to them; (but when they touched it not) he said: “Will you not eat?”
Then he conceived a fear of them. (The angels) said: “Fear not.” And they transmitted him the glad tidings (about the conception and birth) of a male offspring, gifted with deep knowledge

Then (Ibrahim’s) wife moved forward in emotional excitement and brought her hand over her face in the normal style exhibiting wonder, and uttered: “(What a news for one who is) at extreme of age and (is) infertile!”
(The angels) said (to the wife): “Thus has uttered your Nourisher-Sustainer! Without doubt He is All-Wise, All-Knowing,”
